mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_business(user_id, business_name, CEO_name, business_address, business_address_detail, business_number, business_registration_img, business_registration_number, state, created_at) values(#{userId}, #{businessName},#{CEOname},#{businessAddress},#{businessAddressDetail},#{businessNumber}, #{businessRegistrationImg},#{businessRegistrationNumber},#{state}, now());
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_business SET state = "등록완료" WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_business WHERE businessId = #{businessId};
SELECT * FROM tb_business;
SELECT * FROM tb_business where user_id = #{userId};
SELECT COUNT(ls.lecture_session_id) FROM tb_lecture_session ls JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(session_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND l.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT COUNT(r.reserve_id) FROM tb_reserve r JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_payment p ON r.reserve_id = p.reserve_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE p.state = '결제 완료' AND DATE_FORMAT(ls.session_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND l.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT ls.lecture_session_id, r.reserve_id, ps.name, ps.phone_number, ps.email , pm.amount, pm.state, pm.refund_info, pm.refund_date, pm.payment_id, pm.payment_date FROM tb_lecture_session ls JOIN tb_reserve r ON ls.lecture_session_id = r.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_person ps ON r.user_id = ps.user_id JOIN tb_payment pm ON r.reserve_id = pm.reserve_id WHERE ls.lecture_session_id = #{lectureSessionId} ORDER BY r.reserve_id DESC

SELECT r.reserve_id, ls.session_date, l.title, ps.name, ps.phone_number , ps.email, pm.payment_id, pm.amount, pm.state, pm.payment_date, pm.payment_kind , pm.refund_date, pm.refund_info, pm.tid FROM tb_reserve r JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON ls.lecture_session_id = r.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON l.lecture_id = ls.lecture_id JOIN tb_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id JOIN tb_person ps ON u.user_id = ps.user_id JOIN tb_payment pm ON r.reserve_id = pm.reserve_id WHERE r.reserve_id = #{reserveId};
SELECT user_id, Business_name, Business_number, business_registration_number FROM tb_business WHERE state = "등록요청" ORDER BY created_at DESC limit 0,5;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, b.* FROM tb_business b LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.business_id = #{businessId} AND b.state = '등록요청'
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, b.* FROM tb_business b LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.business_id = #{businessId} AND u.identity = 'business'

WITH all_months AS ( SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()), '-', LPAD(months.m, 2, '0')) AS month FROM (SELECT 1 AS m UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) AS months ) SELECT a.month AS period, COALESCE(SUM(pm.amount), 0) AS period_total FROM all_months a LEFT JOIN (SELECT p.payment_date, p.amount, p.state, ls.session_date FROM tb_payment p JOIN tb_reserve r ON p.reserve_id = r.reserve_id JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId}) AS pm ON DATE_FORMAT(pm.session_date, "%Y-%m") = a.month AND pm.state = "결제 완료" GROUP BY a.period ORDER BY a.period;

WITH seven_days AS ( SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL days.num DAY AS day FROM (SELECT 0 AS num UNION SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6) AS days ) SELECT a.day AS period, COALESCE(SUM(pm.amount), 0) AS period_total FROM seven_days a LEFT JOIN (SELECT p.payment_date, p.amount, p.state, ls.session_date FROM tb_payment p JOIN tb_reserve r ON p.reserve_id = r.reserve_id JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId}) AS pm ON DATE_FORMAT(pm.session_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = a.day AND pm.state = "결제 완료" GROUP BY a.period ORDER BY a.period;

SELECT sum(p.amount) AS total FROM tb_payment p JOIN tb_reserve r ON p.reserve_id = r.reserve_id JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(ls.session_date, "%Y") = YEAR(NOW()) AND p.state = "결제 완료";

SELECT sum(p.amount) AS total FROM tb_payment p JOIN tb_reserve r ON p.reserve_id = r.reserve_id JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(ls.session_date) BETWEEN CURDATE()-6 AND CURDATE() AND p.state = "결제 완료";

SELECT SUM(p.amount) AS total FROM tb_payment p JOIN tb_reserve r ON p.reserve_id = r.reserve_id JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(ls.session_date, "%Y-%m") = DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH), "%Y-%m") AND p.state = "결제 완료";

SELECT SUM(p.amount) AS total FROM tb_payment p JOIN tb_reserve r ON p.reserve_id = r.reserve_id JOIN tb_lecture_session ls ON r.lecture_session_id = ls.lecture_session_id JOIN tb_lecture l ON ls.lecture_id = l.lecture_id WHERE l.user_id = 1 AND DATE(ls.session_date) BETWEEN CURDATE()+1 AND CURDATE()+7 AND p.state = "결제 완료";
